newsitem.title: RUSSIA: Two die as Russian military aiRcraft crashes.
newsitem.headline: Two die as Russian military aiRcraft crashes.

text.p: A Russian pilot and his navigator were killed when their military aircraft crashed during a routine flight, the defence ministry said on Thursday.
A ministry spokesman said the MiG-31 plane disappeared from radar screens shortly after 11.30 a.m. (0830 GMT) on Wednesday.

The wreckage was found several hours later about 300 km (190 miles) from the airport where the plane began its flight at Kotlas, 800 km (500 miles) northeast of Moscow, he said. The spokesman said the cause of the crash was not known.
